channel.title: Cant find main class
channel.description: The Client and source work perfect on my laptop and i know my server is 100% portforwarded, but when i put all the files ina new folder then make everything hidden except for run.bat. But when i download it on my other pc and try to run it, it says cant find main class.

item.title: Cant find main class
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

xforeverfree:

The Client and source work perfect on my laptop and i know my server is 100% portforwarded, but when i put all the files ina new folder then make everything hidden except for run.bat. But when i download it on my other pc and try to run it, it says cant find main class.

Try showing the .class files.

Read full topic
